headline: Defense Rests: No More Witnesses, Your Honor
lead_paragraph: “Danger. Danger. Danger. To lower the bar of impeachment, based on these articles of impeachment, would impact the functioning of our constitutional republic and the framework of that Constitution for generations.”
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
The Room Where It Happened: A White House Memoir (Book)
